author: Duplicate vjandrea
post_text: September 16, 2018 at 12:09 AM#1Hello there,I am trying to retrieve and possibily edit the elements of a layout using the command line. If I use List I can see only two default elements for every layout (background and grid?) but not the elements added manually.Does anyone know if there's a way to interact with layout elements using the command line?thanksandreaP.S. the command I used to list the layout elements is:CodeList 38.1.*.*.*
